00789  protected:
00790 
00795   struct State {
00796     DGtal::Color penColor;            
00797     DGtal::Color fillColor;           
00798     double lineWidth;        
00799     Shape::LineStyle lineStyle;  
00800     Shape::LineCap lineCap;      
00801     Shape::LineJoin lineJoin;   
00802     Fonts::Font font;           
00803     double fontSize;               
00804     double unitFactor;        
00805     State();
00806     double unit( const double & x ) { return x * unitFactor; }
00807     Point unit( const Point & p ) { return Point( p.x * unitFactor, p.y * unitFactor); }
00808     void unit( Shape & shape ) {  shape.scaleAll( unitFactor ); }
00809   };
00810   State _state;       
00811   DGtal::Color _backgroundColor;   
00812   Path _clippingPath;
